text: the thin metal pole of the floor lamp, not the spherical lampshade or base
all the tufted buttons on the sofa backrest
the frame border of the left artwork only, not the interior shapes
the teal rectangle at the top-right inside the right artwork
only the ribbed vertical slats of the coffee table base, not the flat plinths or tabletop
the blanket fringe along the lower edge of the throw, not the rest of the blanket
the flower-shaped pillow's central disk only, not the petals
the leftmost square pillow on the sofa (the light one closest to the lamp)
